title.rendered: Elegant Themes Review: Is it Worth Buying in 2022?

content.rendered:
[et_pb_section fb_built=”1″ admin_label=”section” _builder_version=”4.16″ global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_row admin_label=”row” _builder_version=”4.16″ background_size=”initial” background_position=”top_left” background_repeat=”repeat” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_column type=”4_4″ _builder_version=”4.16″ custom_padding=”|||” global_colors_info=”{}” custom_padding__hover=”|||”][et_pb_text admin_label=”Text” _builder_version=”4.16″ global_colors_info=”{}” text_font_size=”15px”]

Elegant Theme’s main reason for being the successful WordPress theme provider across the globe is because of their best Divi theme, which has a lot of awesome features and with great tech and support team there to help their customers and they have successfully achieved to be the best WordPress themes company, with their 14 long years of experience. Till now, the Elegant Theme has gained more than 806,875 customers utilizing their themes and plug-in for WordPress websites. Elegant Themes is in the process of delivering various new and trendy Divi Themes features and plug-ins in the future. In this Elegant Themes review, you will get all knowledge about the Divi theme.

About Elegant Themes Company

Elegant theme company was founded by Nick Roach. Nick was studying in college while he started working on this project. In starting Nick Roach has not thought about making a Divi theme with such features and all, at that time Elegant Theme was making a theme like other WordPress theme developing companies. After being in this business of WordPress theme development, they have come up with Divi Theme and Now Divi theme is one of the most used themes in the world. The elegant theme has been in business for the last 14 years and has a team size of 107 and 806,875 customers globally.

Elegant Themes Review: Multipurpose WordPress Theme

It was the best decision taken by me to use the Divi WordPress theme as it does not require a single amount of coding skills. Our team started recommending Divi after using it. You just need to have a clear view of what you and your website needs, and you are almost there. I liked the play like a task of doing just dragging and dropping, and you are making your website without taking web developers’ support.

Hundred Awesome Features of Divi Theme are:

  • Elegant Themes has 46 modules and 16 Woocommerce modules like mdoules related to Call to Actions, Sliders, Blogs, Galleries, Woo Cart Products, Woo Cart Totals, Woo Cart Cross Sells, Woo Checkout Billing and many more, which helps to write content and the combination of various modules is possible to create multiple styles of a website. Simpler configuring options are provided by Divi, which does not require having an idea of coding at all.
  • Divi theme provides 800+ Pre-made designs and Brand new layouts are added weekly along with royalty free photos, icons, and illustrations. The theme Advanced design features provided by Divi allow you to have total control of different layout designs.
  • Divi theme has a option of drag and drop which allows me to design my webiste and make it more and more attractive and unique.
  • It is a very easy task to copy and paste whatever content is needed from the page.  You can have multiple undo and redo as every action you make. Even they have auto save features.
  • Divi Theme has recnetly lauch Divi Marketplace, which brings next level power to Divi theme and there are alot developer who are working for the divi theme and bringing new features, which make Divi theme features rich theme.
  • The best feature is that Divi has the inbuilt contact form which can be added to your website, with the forms like membership login and registration. By this, it prevents you from installing extra plug-in and makes it easier to make a contact page for the website.
  • Divi is now a theme builder , which means you can make custom divi header and custom div footer with global design and robust conditional logic option availbe to make a custom theme with the help of Divi theme builder.
  • Recently people were every concern about the Elegant Theme Divi performace, but with recent update on performance, Divi is way faster than any other theme builer out there in market.
  • Divi 4.0 is coming soon, as i have been using Divi for last 6 years and i very fimilar about the Elegant Theme team and these guys are planning a huge improvement in Divi 4.0 with more module and even more improvement in perfomance .
  • Divi theme has also robust Ecommerce website making cability. Recent they have brought 8  New Divi WooCommerce Modules to Divi theme.
  • Divi theme have very huge coummunity out there to help you in your Divi website. You can join there official Facbook group.
  • Divi role editor is very cool and advance conditional option for role, it very handy feature which help you when you are giving access of your website to different users.
  • Divi theme loves developers , they have made APIs for there Divi theme, which helps third party developers to make product related to Divi theme.
  • Last but not least, there are alot of best WordPress page builders like Elementor, Beaver Builder, Gutenberg and many more. But what I like about the Elegant themes company is that they listen to their customers and help them to solve their problems with their fast support system.

When looking at these features, creating my website has become an easy and interesting task for the bloggers like me. Your website must look beautiful and catchy whatever may be the product or stuff you are promoting or selling. The first impression is always considered from the looks of your website. If a viewer does not find it that interesting, then you will just work hard for it, without making money. I started using elegant themes as they are handy and attractive to use for the bloggers like me who are least interested in coding.

Divi WordPress Theme: Website without Code

When you start any business, it is obvious that you want everything to be done uniquely for it, and you try to find out the best option amongst all. The Elegant Theme can be one of them, which help you to build a classy looking website for your business and client. When it is said to have an Elegant themes review, it is highly compatible, and you are getting it by paying just $89 ( Buy Now). In the offer time, you can get this Divi theme at a huge discount which makes the Divi theme which makes it a great deal.

Free Plugin Elegant Themes: Extra, Bloom, Monarch & more

Elegant Themes offer a couple of awesome free plugin like Bloom, Monarch. Let me explain both plugin functionalities. Bloom is a very powerful email capturing tool, which allows you to capture email with the help of popup, sider below post etc. Email capturing is one of the most important parts of Digital Marketing. Another powerful plugin Monarch is used to share your content on all social media platforms. As you all know Social media Marketing is very important in any business nowadays. As the maximum number of people are active on social media platforms like Facebook, Snapchat, Instagram and Linkedin etc.

Fast Elegant Themes Support: Quick Solutions

Elegant themes have one of the best technical support teams. Their support system is very simple. You have to log in to your account and go to the support section and create a ticket and mention your problem. As per my experience, they reply within 24 hrs and the solution is also very easy. Sometimes, when I was not able to resolve the problem after their given solution, I have to only reply to that ticket and the elegant support team manually fix the issue by themselves. So, as per my experience, Elegant themes are valued for money.

See also: 03 Top tips for taking wordpress website development services.

Money Back Guarantee: 30 Days Money Back

806,875 Customers Are Already Building Amazing Websites With Divi. Join The Most Empowered WordPress Community On The Web. Elegant Theme provides 30 days money back Guarantee. So, it is a very good deal, if you do not like the themes, you can get your money back.

Should You buy Divi Theme? Elegant Themes Review

In one word “yes”, you should buy the Divi theme from the Elegant Theme. If you want to make beautiful and unique websites, I would recommend buying the Divi theme. As it drags and drops the feature theme, you need not be good at coding. Hope this Elegant Themes Review will help you to make the right decision. It is not like, I am promoting this theme it is all my personal experience that I am sharing with you and I like the theme. I have built 70+ websites on Divi Theme. You can check my designs.

[/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][/et_pb_section]
